channel.title: Torrent Block?
channel.description:
Yea so I know this isn't relevant to anything we do in Mopar but we do have some Torrent *experts* here so I decided to post it here.
I'm just downloading Vice City Stories for my PSP from Torrents and it keeps freezing on 88.8%, I've tried around 3 different Torrents and all of them stop at the exact location, the thing that pisses me off is that in the Torrent Info it says around 1500 ppl have downloaded it and those greedy bastards aren't sharing how. So is this something Rockstar cooked up or do I need to modify something in my client for it continue? (Or maybe should I even switch my BT Client?)

item.title: Torrent Block?

@jme wrote:

I’ll pm you the download link right now.

Read full topic

item.title: Torrent Block?
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

Haha forget I said that.

When you said BT, I thought you were talking about BitTorrent.

Read full topic

item.title: Torrent Block?
item.dc:creator: @VG_Kobra VG_Kobra
item.description:
@VG_Kobra wrote:

bullzeye:

You’re using BitTorrent? I think it stops you until you seed a certain amount. Use uTorrent. It should work.

I do use UTorrent, look at my sig I even advertise it

And you can only seed when you’ve finished the dl, I don’t see how your dl can stop if your not seeding then

Read full topic

item.title: Torrent Block?
item.dc:creator: @VG_Kobra VG_Kobra
item.description:
@VG_Kobra wrote:

[quote=“jme_009, post:9, topic:28610”]I’ll tell you what I’ll do.

I’ll download it from a different torrent and then upload it to my site. If everything goes as planned you should have it tonight, or definitly by tomorrow morning. I’m gone for most of today so I can’t really monitor it so well, so hopefully it’ll work.

[br][size=1]Posted at: November 25, 2006, 10:04:30 AM[/size][hr]I’ll have it ready soon. I’m just uploading it now, still needs an hour and a half. I would have uploaded it last night but a lot of shit happened last night so I couldn’t.[/quote]

Thanks!

But how did you finish downloading it? You must have been really lucky to find a seeder lol

Read full topic

item.title: Torrent Block?
item.dc:creator: @VG_Kobra VG_Kobra
item.description:
@VG_Kobra wrote:

jme_009:

Yes because all the peers are stuck at the same download position. You’ll have to find one with at least a few seeds. I never download a torrent unless it has at least 5 seeds.

It has 29k peers and 271 seeds

Read full topic

item.title: Torrent Block?
item.dc:creator: @VG_Kobra VG_Kobra
item.description:
@VG_Kobra wrote:

BobDole81:

Wow, that’s a lot of peers. Well it says there are 271 seeds, and 40 have been completed, so it should eventually finish…I don’t think there’s much else you can do than just leave it running.

True I don’t think there is anything more I can do. Maybe I’ll get lucky and find it on a FTP Server but thats an unlikely fact

Thanks for your help

Read full topic

item.title: Torrent Block?
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

Wow, that’s a lot of peers. Well it says there are 271 seeds, and 40 have been completed, so it should eventually finish…I don’t think there’s much else you can do than just leave it running.

Read full topic

item.title: Torrent Block?
item.dc:creator: @VG_Kobra VG_Kobra
item.description:
@VG_Kobra wrote:

BobDole81:

Number of downloads is not related to number of sharers…how many seeders are there for the torrent? Chances are that this is due to a lack of seeders, and that everyone is stuck at that position. So either there are absolutely no seeds or there are few who are trying to serve everyone, but progress is slow…anyway, changing your client probably won’t help you at all.

This is the torrent I’m currently dling and is stuck at 88.8.

http://www.meganova.org/details/342727.html

As you can see in the Discuss File tab there are also other people having the same problem as me.

Also as you can see there are many seeders but in my client it says lik 40 peers connected but no seeds

So what do you suggest? Do I just leave it out until it manages to find a seed or what?

Read full topic

item.title: Torrent Block?
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

Number of downloads is not related to number of sharers…how many seeders are there for the torrent? Chances are that this is due to a lack of seeders, and that everyone is stuck at that position. So either there are absolutely no seeds or there are few who are trying to serve everyone, but progress is slow…anyway, changing your client probably won’t help you at all.

Read full topic
